item.title: At Lyman direction Russian army shelled Makiyivka of Luhansk region and Terny¸ Serebryanka, Spirne, of Donetsk region. Russia... (LiveUAMap)

Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Kharkiv region and Kharkiv city, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
